data.message: Why I have to use Messenger on Facebook if I don't want to?!!!!!!!! I'm force to do it by Messenger!!!!! Why if I don't want to?!!!!!!! With my password on Facebook entry!!!!! Why?

replies.message: Hey Ewa. Messenger is a much faster and better experience. In fact, we've found that people get replies about 20% faster on Messenger than on Facebook. You can learn more about Messenger here: http://bit.ly/2gvGVFS. -Joe
It's complicated and slow down. With one click I opened messages now it takes forever. I feel I'm back in time with the Internet.
